text: Adudagi Jisuna makhoiga loinana chatminnare. Amasung makhoina yum yousillakkadaba panglap laptraba matam aduwaida lanmi chamagi luchingba aduna mahakki pao puhalladuna mahakki marupsingbu tharaklaga asumna Ibungoda haihallare, â€œIbungo, Nahakna eigi yumda amuk lengbiraktuna nasabu amuk wahanbiraganu. Maramdi Ibungobu eigi yumda kousinjaba ei matik chajade.
